title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When a file is open in the editor and the user tries to open the same file with a different type of editor using the 'Open With...' option, nothing happens and the file remains open in the current editor.
EB: When a file is open in the editor and the user selects the 'Open With...' option and chooses a different type of editor, the file should be opened in the selected editor.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the file 'test.xml' in the Navigator.
2. Confirm that the file is currently open in an editor (e.g. 'Scripted Resource Editor').
3. Right-click on the file and select 'Open With...'
4. Choose a different type of editor (e.g. 'Default Text Editor') from the options.
5. Verify that a new editor window opens for the file in the selected editor type.
